page.title: 09TOURISM
page.content: This southerly region is mainly rural but it also contains many tourist attractions and the natural beauty of the area with its open scenery and cliff walks draws many holiday-makers every year.{TOURIST ATTRACTIONS}The Little Chapel is a miniature of the chapel and grotto found at Lourdes.It is decorated with pebbles,pieces of stained glass and pottery.It is believed to be the smallest chapel in the world;only 12 people can fit inside.The German Underground Hospital and Museum shows examples of wartime uniforms,weapons,newspapers,maps and food parcels.The many tunnels of the hospital are numbered so that tourists are not lost.Life-like displays show the construction of the tunnels.Some of the wards contain the original metal beds,signs indicate where the cinema,operating theatre and mortuary
